chart-desc: Adds the {{#chart:}} parser function for displaying charts
chart-error-data-source-page-not-found: Chart tabular data source page not found.
chart-error-default-source-not-specified: Chart definition page does not specify a default data source.
chart-error-incompatible-chart-definitio: Definition page is incompatible with charts.
chart-error-incompatible-data-source: Tabular data source page is incompatible with charts.
chart-error-invalid-data-source: Tabular data source page is invalid.
chart-error-invalid-height: Height must be an integer greater than or equal to 100.
chart-error-invalid-width: Width must be an integer greater than or equal to 100.
chart-error-shell-disabled: Charts cannot be rendered because shell execution is disabled.
chart-error-rendering-error: There was an error rendering the chart.
chart-error-unexpected: Unexpected error occurred when rendering the chart.
chart-error-category: Pages using the Chart extension with rendering errors
chart-error-category-desc: The page contains a chart with rendering errors.
chart-render-category-desc: The page uses the {{#chart}} parser function.
chartjson-error-version: $1 must be an integer between $2 and $3 inclusive.
chartjson-error-enum: $1 must be one of the following values: $2
chart-error-source-not-found: Tabular data source page not found.
chart-error-invalid-source-type: Tabular data source page is of invalid type.
chart-error-invalid-source-content: Tabular data source page contents are invalid.
chart-error-request-too-large: Chart and tabular data exceed the maximum allowed size of $1 bytes. Please use a smaller dataset or consider [https://www.mediawiki.org/wiki/Extension:Chart/Transforms data transformation options] to filter or aggregate your data.
chart-error-switchable-string: Parameter "$1" must be a string or an object that maps valid language codes to single line strings no longer than $2 characters, without tabs or trailing spaces, e.g. <kbd>{ "en":"String in English", ... }</kbd>
